changeLogMessages: Add support for environment variables `http_proxy` and `https_proxy`; the .NET SDK now matches the behavior of the AWS CLI when using an [HTTP proxy](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/userguide/cli-configure-proxy.html). Note that [HTTPS proxies](https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/31113) are only supported in .NET 8 (and later).
